Select the applications that will send notifications to your Smartwatch.
Install ToqAN applet on your Smartwatch.

Give ToqAN permissions to monitor notificaions. If you are not recieving notifications properly, please take away and give permissions again. If it does not solve the problems check the notification app list.
Check your connection sending a notification to the Smartwatch.
If you don\'t want to recieve duplicate notifications, open Toq\'s default app and clear all app notifications.
If you are not going to use this app anymore, uninstall the applet clicking the button below and then click on "stop and exit" in the action bar.
ToqAN applet will show your Android device current notifications. Select the app that will be able to show you the notifications.
Use the same as in Notification WhiteList
Notification service is not initialized. Please check Permissions.
